title: Was my internet connection sabotaged?
body:
So I've been playing league fairly consistently for the path month or so with no D/C or lag problems whatsoever. Ping rides around +/-50ms, rarely ever getting up to 100ms. Last night things changed though...

After I finished a match last night, a little "Give us Feedback" window popped up in my client, asking me if I'd be willing to participate in a survey from Riot Games concerning my connectivity. I replied that I never had problems with my internet connection, which had been true thus far. 

Literally the next game I played my ping was at 1500+ ms consistently, making the game unplayable. Ok, I thought, I guess that puts a cap on my gaming for the night.

I wake up and give my internet a speed test, it's complete garbage. 2000+ ping, .07 Mbps Upload...
 
I call the cable company the ask if they see any problems from their end of the situation and they say they aren't seeing any. I bypassed the router and had some success, but I literally can't even stream a song on the internet via WIFI now. I've tried resetting the devices numerous times, but what was previously a rig that was working perfectly for me is now just a fart in the wind.

I wish I never told Riot how good my internet connection was...

I SMELL A CONSPIRACY

replies.body: What would a conspiracy do?  Even if your internet is perfectly fine, you can still have issues connecting to specific servers.  In your case, it sounds like you might be having some packet loss or issue maintaining communication the the game server.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on.  The results will also provide troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  I hope it helps!

Thanks, trying to troubleshoot right now...

More info -

* It takes considerably longer for log in authentication to get to my client home page
* There is no content on the home page; it says "Sorry, we're unable to load this content right now"
* Even on a wired connection, my ping is over 2000 ms

From log reader:

"Your average ping was 592 milliseconds.
The worst ping you experienced was 1703ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues."

"Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.09%.
Overall, this means you had a low amount of packets lost during the game."

Thanks for the follow up!  So it sounds like there is an issue here with not just in-game, but reaching our authentication servers too.  At this point, I suggest going through every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve any network issues that's preventing you from establishing comms.

You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure firewall settings that could block that connection.
